name: Music of the Spheres (itch)
description:
**The shaders & audio can be somewhat dodgy in the web version!** I highly recommend you download the PC build if you can. It runs better, anyway💜 Controls InputEffectClick and drag LMB Move the planets
Hold RMB Speed up the simulationRReset the Level

You can also push K to skip the current level if you're stuck. I won't judge, it's a jam game after all. <3
